      • saveProject

        public void saveProject(int projectID,
                        java.lang.String text)
                 throws DatabaseException,
                        java.io.IOException,
                        InvalidDriverException
        Saves the project into the database
        Parameters:
        projectID - the project ID
        text - the text to save as content of the project
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if the database can't be reached
        java.io.IOException - if the file can't be saved with text content
        InvalidDriverException - if the driver is invalid

      • insertProject

                         java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String pathToFile,
                         java.lang.String hash)
                  throws DatabaseException
        Inserts a new project into the database
        Parameters:
        userID - owner's id of the file
        name - name of the file
        pathToFile - absolute path to the file in user's computer
        hash - the hash code of the project.
        Returns:
        id of the inserted Project
        Throws:
        DatabaseException
